title: Ronnie's chicken and couscous salad
ingredients: ['200g plain couscous', '75g rocket leaves', '75g your fave lettuce', '1 onion, diced', '2 carrots, grated', '1 red pepper, diced', '1 yellow pepper, diced', '4 tomatoes, diced', '2 cooked chicken breast fillets, sliced', 'garlic and herb salad dressing to taste']
